thread.title: JAIME SUAREZ BERROCAL
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by JAIME SUAREZ BERROCAL

author: JAIME SUAREZ BERROCAL
title: JAIME SUAREZ BERROCAL
text: I was beyond impressed with the products, services, and sales they had. I ordered over $1200 in furniture AND only paid $60 dollars to have it delivered to my home. I will absolutely recommend this store to all my friends and family.
